Zhaosu county or Mongghulküre nahiyisi in Ili Kazakh autonomous prefecture 伊犁哈薩克自治州|伊犁哈萨克自治州[Yi1 li2 Ha1 sa4 ke4 zi4 zhi4 zhou1], Xinjiang

sentences.english: Observation of the wild rapeseed pollen grains under the scanning electron microscope.
sentences.chinese: 新疆昭苏野生油菜花粉形态扫描观察。

sentences.english: You see the Zhaosu Grassland is flat and wide.
sentences.chinese: 你看这昭苏草原是平坦宽阔。

sentences.english: Taking Zhaosu county as an example, its rangeland resources classification system is constituted.
sentences.chinese: 以昭苏县为例，建立该县草地资源分类系统。

sentences.english: We also saw a stone man in Zhaosu.
sentences.chinese: 我们在昭苏也看到过石人。
